issue.title: [C++][Python] Add a space after commas in pretty-print output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15475](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15475). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Following ARROW-14798 we can have this kind of pretty-print output:

```Java

struct: [
  -- is_valid: all not null
  -- child 0 type: int64
  [0,1,2,3,4,...,45,46,47,48,49]
  -- child 1 type: list<item: string>
  [["crown","trunk","roots"],["roots","seeds"],...,[],["crown"]],
...,
```

IMHO it would read better as:

```Java

struct: [
  -- is_valid: all not null
  -- child 0 type: int64
  [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, ..., 45, 46, 47, 48, 49]
  -- child 1 type: list<item: string>
  [["crown", "trunk", "roots"], ["roots", "seeds"], ..., [], ["crown"]],
...,
```
